HELP_TEXT.alwaysDash: If on, always dash even without holding dash button.
HELP_TEXT.bgmVolume: This changes the volume of bgm.
HELP_TEXT.bgsVolume: This changes the volume of bgs.
HELP_TEXT.meVolume: This changes the volume of me sound effects.
HELP_TEXT.seVolume: This changes the volume of sound effects.
HELP_TEXT.switch_1: If on, does something really neat.
